Graphical user interface and tools for Go programs that implement Go Text Protocol (GTP).

See:
          Description

Packages
net.sf.gogui.boardpainter Paint a Go board using AWT graphics.
net.sf.gogui.game Game tree.
net.sf.gogui.go Go board.
net.sf.gogui.gogui Application GoGui.
net.sf.gogui.gtp GTP server and client implementation.
net.sf.gogui.gui Graphical user interface classes.
net.sf.gogui.sgf Read and write games in SGF format.
net.sf.gogui.tex Write games in LaTeX PSGO style.
net.sf.gogui.thumbnail SGF thumbnails according to the freedesktop.org standard.
net.sf.gogui.tools.client Connects to a remote Go program supporting GTP.
net.sf.gogui.tools.convert  
net.sf.gogui.tools.display GTP adapter showing the current board in a window.
net.sf.gogui.tools.dummy Dummy Go program for testing GTP controlling programs.
net.sf.gogui.tools.regress Run GTP regression tests.
net.sf.gogui.tools.server Connects a Go program supporting GTP to a socket.
net.sf.gogui.tools.thumbnailer Command line tool for creating SGF thumbnails.
net.sf.gogui.tools.twogtp GTP adapter for playing games between two Go programs.
net.sf.gogui.util Miscellaneous utilities.

 

Graphical user interface and tools for Go programs that implement Go Text Protocol (GTP).

Related Documentation

  • GTP - Go Text Protocol
